title: WESTWOOD.Command.And.Conquer.Classics-NAiLZ
description:
##########################################
###    westwood classics collection    ###
##########################################

This is a collection of all WestWood&#039;s best 2D games - you won&#039;t find any 
3D accelerated garbage (like Renegade) here! I also spared you of witnessing
the crap that is called Sole Survivor. All games were installled and tested 
on Windows XP Pro SP3. 


Contents
~~~~~~~~
Dune II (1992)
Dune 2000 (1998)

Command & Conquer: Tiberian Dawn (1995) 
Command & Conquer: The Covert Operations (expansion pack) (1996)
Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun (1999) 
Command & Conquer: Tiberian Sun: Firestorm (expansion pack) (2000)

Command & Conquer: Red Alert (1996) 
Command & Conquer: Red Alert: Counterstrike (expansion pack) (1997)
Command & Conquer: Red Alert: The Aftermath (expansion pack) (1997)
Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2 (2000) 
Command & Conquer: Yuri&#039;s Revenge (expansion pack) (2001)


Custom Cover
~~~~~~~~~~~~
I have included custom album art I made incase you wish to burn these to 
DVD. I put all the Red Alert games on the first DVD and the Tiberian series
plus Dune on the second. Check the JPGs! With the RARs extracted the ISOs
will easily fit; both DVDs will be a little under 4GB.


Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~
All archives come with NFOs containing precise instructions. It is
advisable to have a virtual disk program installed, I recommend Daemon Tools.
